alert.note: Alert for Mitchell; Osborne (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:39PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mitchell and eastern Osborne Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 439 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Luray, or 20 miles northeast of Russell, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tipton and Downs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Kansas.
